short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take notes that show up for a specific website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take notes that show up for a specific website and/or a specific page on that website. Search notes and the sites they were taken on by note text, website title, or website URL.

Sync notes across multiple devices and share notebooks with colleagues.
